meanings.definition: A thin, crisp, spicy cookie made with molasses and ginger.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake gingersnap cookies with my grandma.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, my mom always makes gingersnap cookies for us.
meanings.sent3: The gingersnap cookie jumped out of the jar and ran away!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of gingersnap cookies filled the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The gingersnap cookie crumbled in my hand, releasing a burst of ginger flavor.

meanings.definition: A quick, sharp retort or response.
meanings.sent1: She always has a clever gingersnap ready for any teasing.
meanings.sent2: His gingersnap shut down the argument immediately.
meanings.sent3: The gingersnap response caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her gingersnap was like a verbal slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: His gingersnap was so sharp, it left everyone speechless.
